name: dashdot
description: Dashdot is a modern, customizable dashboard for monitoring system health. It provides resource graphs, hardware info, network stats, and works with systems running Docker or Linux, all in a polished web UI.
features: System Monitoring: Real-time CPU, RAM, and disk usage graphs. Complete visibility.
Hardware Info: Detailed information about your system components. Know your setup.
Network Stats: Track bandwidth and connection statistics. Monitor traffic patterns.
Modern Design: Polished, customizable interface. Beautiful and functional.
Docker Support: Monitor containerized environments easily. Perfect for modern stacks.
Self-Hosted: Run your own system dashboard. Privacy-focused monitoring.
